= camel top

Top status of Camel integrations


== Usage

[source,bash]
----
camel top [options]
----


== Subcommands

[cols="2,5",options="header"]
|===
| Subcommand | Description
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-top-context.adoc[context] | Top status of Camel integrations
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-top-group.adoc[group] | Top performing route groups
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-top-processor.adoc[processor] | Top performing processors
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-top-route.adoc[route] | Top performing routes
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-top-source.adoc[source] | List top processors (source) in a running Camel integration
|===



== Options

[cols="2,5,1,2",options="header"]
|===
| Option | Description | Default | Type
| `--watch` | Execute periodically and showing output fullscreen |  | boolean
| `-h,--help` | Display the help and sub-commands |  | boolean
|===
